name: School's Out!
description:
While schools are in lockdown, the hallways are free for play! Your friends set up obstacle courses throughout the school. See if you can beat all six trials in time while avoiding administrators and tattletales who roam the halls. Can you reach the flags and return them to your friends in time?

CONTROLS
Move - Arrow Keys/ASWD
Jump - Space bar / Left Mouse Button
Menus - Mouse

[VIM JAM 2020 Submission]

WARNING: Game Over Screen currently doesn't work. Something isn't supported between the code on my local machine and using WebGL. However, I have run out of time to fix it. You can still play through the entire game. However, you must refresh the page to play again.
